example.plate_above_height: The Z height of the top of the plate
example.plate_pick_steps_module: Number of Z height steps to travel to pick a plate when the gripper approaches from the top of the plate
example.plate_pick_steps_stack: Number of Z height steps to travel to pick a plate when the gripper approaches using module transfer motions
example.plate_lid_steps: Number of Z height steps to travel to pick a plate lid when the gripper approaches from the top of the plate
example.lid_destination_height: The Z height of the destination location when transferring a plate lid
